Text:
I gave you the -1 quality.
Audio out of synch.
How do I remove the audio commentary playing over the movie? It's kind of annoying.

Good one. 
Man, I tell ya; Just give Terry Gilliam an Idea, and a bunch of clear plastic wrap, and STUFF GETS DONE!

Anyway, This played clean and quick for me.  Like was said above, the audio is easily adjusted on VLC (Tools/Effects and filters/ Synchronization/Advance of audio over video.  -0.4)
Easy Peasy,  Cough and Sneezey .

This might be asking a lot, but can anyone explain a bit about all these different file types? I use media player, and have had a few problems with incompatible file types etc.  Also, why are there such differences in file size? I really don't know much about any of this, so any help or advice would be great.

Thanks! Such a great movie.

On VLC player use the F and G keys on the keyboard to adjust audio sync. You want to shift the audio by about -400ms.
